triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: LLMs form the core technology enabling Agent Laboratory to autonomously conduct research across literature review, experimentation, and report writing.

triples.name: Autonomous agent
triples.relevance: Agent Laboratory is an autonomous agent system that performs complex research tasks independently with minimal human oversight.

triples.name: Literature review
triples.relevance: Literature review is the first stage of Agent Laboratory's three-stage research process.

triples.name: Experiment
triples.relevance: Experimentation is the second stage where Agent Laboratory validates hypotheses and tests approaches.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: The generated machine learning code is evaluated against existing methods to demonstrate state-of-the-art performance.

triples.name: Scientific method
triples.relevance: Agent Laboratory implements the complete scientific method through its three-stage process of literature review, experimentation, and reporting.

triples.name: Discovery science
triples.relevance: Agent Laboratory accelerates scientific discovery by automating the research process and reducing the time scientists spend on low-level coding and writing.
